SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am11
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am11.view.client

Interface ExceptionThrower

All Known Implementing Classes:
GuiExceptionReceiver, TuiExceptionReceiver
public interface ExceptionThrower
Interface that defines the methods that will be called from the network side to notify the user interface that an exception has occurred, there is a method for each type of exception so that the view can handle them in a different way.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    throwException (@NotNull NotGodPlayerException ex)
    Handles the NotGodPlayerException, thrown when the player tries to perform an action allowed only to the god player
    void
    throwException (@NotNull NotSetNumOfPlayerException ex)
    Handles the NotSetNumOfPlayerException, thrown when the player tries to connect before the god player has set the number of players
    void
    throwException (@NotNull EmptyDeckException ex)
    Handles the EmptyDeckException, thrown when the player tries to draw a card from an empty deck
    void
    throwException (@NotNull GameStatusException ex)
    Handles the GameStatusException, thrown when the player tries to perform an action not allowed in the current game status
    void
    throwException (@NotNull IllegalCardPlacingException ex)
    Handles the IllegalCardPlacingException, thrown when the player tries to place a card in an illegal position
    void
    throwException (@NotNull IllegalPickActionException ex)
    Handles the IllegalPickActionException, thrown when the player tries to pick that is not allowed
    void
    throwException (@NotNull IllegalPlateauActionException ex)
    Handles the IllegalPlateauActionException, thrown when the player tries to perform an action not allowed on the plateau
    void
    throwException (@NotNull IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException ex)
    Handles the IllegalPlayerSpaceActionException, thrown when a player tries to perform an action on a space that is not allowed
    void
    throwException (@NotNull MaxHandSizeException ex)
    Handles the MaxHandSizeException, thrown when the player tries to draw a card when his hand is full
    void
    throwException (@NotNull NotInHandException ex)
    Handles the NotInHandException, thrown when the player tries to use a card not in his hand
    void
    throwException (@NotNull NumOfPlayersException ex)
    Handles the NumOfPlayersException, thrown when the player tries to set an invalid number of players
    void
    throwException (@NotNull PlayerInitException ex)
    Handles the PlayerInitException, thrown when the player tries to initialize the game with an invalid number of players
    void
    throwException (@NotNull TurnsOrderException ex)
    Handles the TurnsOrderException, thrown when the player tries to perform an action while it's not his turn
